title: How to learn NextJS
content: Next.js is a popular React framework that allows you to build server-side rendered React applications with ease. It is a powerful tool for building fast and scalable web applications, and is used by many companies and developers around the world. To learn Next.js, you should start by learning the basics of React, as Next.js is built on top of React. Once you have a good understanding of React, you can move on to learning the features and capabilities of Next.js, such as server-side rendering, static site generation, and API routes. Practice is key when learning Next.js, so be sure to work on projects and exercises to reinforce your skills. With dedication and practice, you can become proficient in Next.js and build amazing web applications.
author: Mamoon Akhter
